backend/main.mo: Actor providing user profiles, push subscriptions, radio stream checks, and request storage with access-control enforcement and HTTP outcalls.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking feature requests to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and key behavior of various frontend files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_DEBUG.md: Notes explaining a failed TypeScript build caused by Node.js typings in App.tsx.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring meta tags, PWA setup, icons, Google Cast SDK, and a recovery UI for slow React mounting.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, categories, and shortcuts.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing versioned caching, cache cleanup, push notifications, and offline support for static assets.
frontend/README-verify.md: Guide for running the frontend verification script to detect build issues.
frontend/scripts/verify-frontend.mjs: Node-based script that checks for browser-incompatible TypeScript types, runs type checking, and validates asset paths before deployment.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing navigation, playback, lifecycle hooks, and global error handling via an error boundary.
frontend/src/components/CastControl.tsx: UI control for starting and stopping Chromecast casting, showing status and tracking cast events.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: Manages PWA installation prompts and platform-specific guides for iOS and Android with dismissal logic.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Fixed bottom tab navigation bar allowing switching between home, browse, and settings views.
frontend/src/components/player/MiniPlaye: A compact audio player showing track info, artwork, and a play/pause button that opens the full player.
frontend/src/components/player/VolumeSli: Slider component that controls and reflects the volume level of an associated audio element.
frontend/src/components/PushNotification: Panel for enabling and managing push notification subscriptions with status indicators and error handling.
frontend/src/components/RequestForm.tsx: Dialog form allowing users to submit song or shoutout requests with validation and backend submission.
frontend/src/components/ServiceWorkerRec: Banner prompting users to refresh or reset when service worker errors or app updates are detected.
frontend/src/components/ShareButton.tsx: A share button component that uses the Web Share API or a fallback modal to copy a URL to the clipboard.
frontend/src/components/shows/ShowCard.t: Renders a clickable card showing show details including image, description, genres, and schedule.
frontend/src/components/status/LiveBadge: A red animated badge indicating that content is currently live.
frontend/src/components/status/OnAirIndi: Small animated dot indicating on‑air status.
frontend/src/components/TrackNotificatio: Displays a styled notification for currently playing tracks with different themes and an optional dismiss button.
frontend/src/data/mockShows.ts: Defines the Show interface and provides mock show data for development.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppLifecyclePlayba: Hook that attempts to auto‑resume audio playback when the page becomes visible, focused, or restored from bfcache.
frontend/src/hooks/useChromecast.tsx: React hook to initialize and manage Chromecast sessions, track availability, casting state, connection status, and handle media loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavoriteStation.ts: Manages a single favorite-station flag using localStorage with a toggle function.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and state tracking with Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Monitors now‑playing metadata to detect track, mix, or live changes and triggers browser notifications with deduplication and permission handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePushSubscription.t: Handles web push subscription flow using a service worker and backend actor, including permission requests and storing subscription data.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching stream URL, checking availability, querying now‑playing data, and submitting song requests (stubbed).
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceWorkerRegis: Manages service worker registration, update handling, reset functionality, and state tracking with cache-busting and diagnostics support.
frontend/src/hooks/useSleepTimer.ts: Provides a countdown sleep timer that pauses audio playback after a set duration with start and cancel controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Handles acquiring and releasing screen wake locks based on activity state, including auto-reacquisition on visibility change.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles and theme variables, including responsive overlay and background rules for dark aesthetic UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with query client and Internet Identity provider before rendering.
frontend/src/screens/BrowseShowsScreen.t: Displays a filterable list of shows with genre and day selectors and renders ShowCard components.
frontend/src/screens/HomeLiveScreen.tsx: Renders the live radio screen with playback controls, now-playing info, quick actions, and error/loading states.
frontend/src/screens/NowPlayingScreen.ts: Full-screen now-playing UI showing artwork, track info, playback controls, volume, and sleep timer management.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsAboutScreen: Settings page with push notification controls, background refresh handling, and app info sections.
frontend/src/screens/ShowDetailScreen.ts: Displays details for a selected show with image, metadata, and actions including adding the event to a calendar.
Captures early startup errors and shows a recovery overlay when critical resource or script failures occur.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Utility for safely sending Google Analytics events with helpers for play, pause, and cast actions.
frontend/src/utils/ics.ts: Generates and downloads an ICS calendar file for a radio show by computing the next airing date.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeArtworkUrl.t: Normalizes artwork URLs, ensuring valid absolute HTTPS paths and handling relative or malformed inputs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, breakpoints, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, and pending requests for background resizing, Home label styling, and Play button visibility changes.
